channel.title: Error - Java i think
channel.description:
Hey Everytime i click run server i get this error
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk186/flyer0101/error21.png[/img]
i believe ive followed all steps correctly, i have tried run as admin re-installing java and all of that..

item.title: Error - Java i think
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

i have figured out what was wrong it wasn’t program files it is (x86) so i changed it and saved and complied but i still get the first error when i try to run the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Error - Java i think
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Dude i was giving you an example!!!

go to C://Program Files/Java and see what version of jdk you have there…

Read full topic

item.title: Error - Java i think
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

i changed it to that now i get path could not be specified

Im using to different sources trying to get it to work one is here
the other one i can find jdk but the error say path not specified.

i cant find the jdk this is what it says:

@echo off
:menu
title F2PPK Compiler
echo Errors:
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Error - Java i think
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

in your server files you should see a file called compile.bat

run that

if it says system cannot find the path specified…

right click, edit, then change jdk1.6.0_## to your version of jdk so if you have 18 it would we jdk1.6.0_18

Read full topic

item.description:
@flyer wrote:

as im new to this what do u mean by that compile the server?

item.title: Error - Java i think
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Your error is that the server cannot find file: client.class

you probably need to compile your client.java

try again after doing this…

hope i helped.

Read full topic
